Disneyland Resort California - Adventures for Two - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Disneyland Resort California - Adventures for Two Discover the dynamic city of Anaheim, nestled in sunny Southern California. Immerse yourself in the magic of Disneyland Resort, where dreams come true amidst enchanting castles, thrilling rides, and beloved characters. Dive into Anaheim's rich cultural scene at the Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center, showcasing captivating exhibitions and immersive art experiences. With its perfect blend of entertainment, culture, and delightful weather, Anaheim invites you to embark on an extraordinary journey that will leave you with memories to cherish. Deal Details Travel Dates 11 May 2026 - 15 Jun 2026 Sale Ends Dec 1, 2025 Priced From $1,979 Enquire Now Discover the dynamic city of Anaheim, nestled in sunny Southern California. Immerse yourself in the magic of Disneyland Resort, where dreams come true amidst enchanting castles, thrilling rides, and beloved characters. Dive into Anaheim's rich cultural scene at the Muzeo Museum and Cultural Center, showcasing captivating exhibitions and immersive art experiences. With its perfect blend of entertainment, culture, and delightful weather, Anaheim invites you to embark on an extraordinary journey that will leave you with memories to cherish. Accommodation Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort + 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket (4 stars) Located just steps away from the iconic Disneyland® Resort parks; Anaheim GardenWalk, Angel Stadium and the Anaheim Convention Centre are close by making it a great base for a stay in Anaheim. Settle into intuitively appointed rooms and suites, which feature Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience and private balconies overlooking the city or lounge with a cool cocktail by the resort-style pool. The thoughtfully designed, Sheraton Park Hotel at the Anaheim Resort offers a welcoming experience for all travellers. 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket - A Disneyland Resort Multi-Day Park Hopper Ticket, with applicable park reservation, is valid for admission to both Disneyland Park and Disney California Adventure Park over a specified number of days, including visits to both Theme Parks on the same day. Rooms Traditional Room (5 nights) 11 May - 10 Jun 26 Stay price: $1,979.00 Includes: 3-Day Disneyland Resort Park Hopper Ticket Note: Airfares & transfers are additional. Features 5 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, double share Airfares and transfers are additional The Westin Anaheim Resort + 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass (4 stars) The Westin Anaheim Resort is a luxurious oasis just moments from Disneyland Resort. With spacious rooms featuring modern amenities, a stunning outdoor pool, and a revitalising spa, it’s the perfect retreat. Enjoy delectable dining options and easy access to nearby attractions, all while experiencing the signature Westin hospitality. 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass - This 3 Day 1 Park per Day ticket lets you visit your nominated park each day with a valid reservation. You can choose either Disneyland Park or Disney California Adventure Park, but only one park per day. This ticket also includes Lightning Lane Multi Pass access for select attractions. Rooms King Room (5 nights) 11 May - 15 Jun 26 Stay price: $2,909.00 Includes: 3-Day, 1 Park Per Day Disneyland Resort Ticket with Lightning Lane Multi Pass Note: Airfares & transfers are additional. Features 5 nights accommodation Inclusions as specified Note: Pricing is per person, double share Airfares and transfers are additional Terms & Conditions Terms & Conditions: Prices are correct as at 04 November 2025 and are subject to availability & change without notice. Sales period: Valid for sale from 04 November 2025 until 01 December 2025 unless otherwise stated, withdrawn or sold out prior. General conditions: All prices are per person & in NZ Dollars. All prices are based on payment by cash or EFTPOS only. Airfares & transfers are additional. Room rates are dynamic providing the best rate of the day dependent on current inventory as such these are subject to availability & change without notice. Disneyland Resort California: Tickets purchased under the AU/NZ Residents Offer require guests to present valid Government-Issued Photo Identification from Australia or New Zealand upon entry to the Park. Guests who are unable to present appropriate ID will not be granted entry. Disney Tickets T&C's Child rates apply for 3-9 years. To enter a park on a particular day, both a park reservation for that day and a Ticket valid for park admission on that day are required for Guests (ages 3 and older). Refer to your e-ticket for details on how to book your park reservation. The guest should check park availability by visiting disneytraveltradeinfo.com/dlrcalendar (or such other URL as communicated by Disney to the Travel Distributor) prior to purchase. Theme parks will be limited in capacity, and park reservations are limited in number and subject to the availability of park reservations allocated to park tickets as determined by Disney, and theme park capacity, and are not guaranteed. It is recommended that guest make their theme park reservation immediately after purchasing their Ticket. Guests with a valid Ticket should visit StartYourDisneylandExperience.com to make theme park reservations. The ticket must be linked to a Disney account, and online registration is required. Park reservation availability can change until the park reservation is confirmed. To accommodate as many types of ticket holders as possible, park reservations for select dates may be made available on a rolling basis. Guests should check for updated availability. Tickets and park reservations are subject to applicable state guidance and other requirements imposed by health authorities and appropriate government agencies. Airfares & holiday packages include airline, operational costs, pre-payable taxes & airport charges unless otherwise stated. Additional levies, government charges & other applicable fees may apply & are beyond our control. Minimum & maximum stay restrictions may apply. Selected deals are based on restricted flight schedules, hotel check in/out time & are ultimately the responsibility of the passengers upon booking to ensure flight schedules & hotel check in/out time are suitable for their needs. Seasonal surcharges & blackout dates may apply depending on date of travel. Stopovers & alternative routes may incur additional costs. Prices are valid for new bookings only. Accommodation, holiday packages, cruises & tours are based on twin share, unless otherwise stated. Holidays are based on consecutive night stays. The accommodation, cruises, airfares, coach & small group tours & any other components included are provided by carriers & hoteliers with their own terms & conditions, which your booking is subject to. Booking and/or service fees apply. For full terms & conditions visit https://travelmanagers.co.nz/terms Experience the world differently.
